scripts.profile: rm isolate*.log profiles.log && node --prof js/app.js data/input_credit_cards_large.txt data/output_credit_cards.txt && ls isolate-0x*.log | xargs -L1 node --prof-process > profiles.log
scripts.build: npm run lint && rimraf js/* && tsc --sourcemap -p ts/
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha --require mocha-global.js $(find js/ -name *.spec.js)
